item.title: Need help on a run server problem
item.dc:creator: @K3xJTAG K3xJTAG
item.description:
@K3xJTAG wrote:

I have the nitro scape source and when i try to run it it just exits out immidiatly and i cant figure out wat to do.
The words when i edit the runserver.bat are…

@echo off
title Pk Planet
Start java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server

ive tried to edit a few things here but nothing will work … this is exactly how it was originally. so does anyone know how to fix this … please comment thank you.

Read full topic
